desc: Songs that would take place during an invasion of any kind! Feel free to be creative with the interpretation.
Songs that would play during the end of the world. This could be a literal apocalypse or just a metaphorical end.
Songs that would play during the beginning of something new. This could be a new era, a new relationship, or anything else you can think of.
Songs that would play during a journey. This could be a physical journey, like a road trip, or an emotional journey.
Songs that would play during a battle. This could be a literal battle or a metaphorical one.
